languages.text: "Я бы заставил их..." {n}Железный кулак сжимается, слышен жалобный скрип аугмента.{/n} "О, они бы не смели и помыслить нарушить закон".
"I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."
languages.original_text: "Я бы заставил их..." {n}Железный кулак сжимается, слышен жалобный скрип аугмента.{/n} "О, они бы не смели и помыслить нарушить закон".

"I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

languages.text: 「奴らを…」{n}彼は鉄の拳を握り締めた。オーグメティックが哀れな軋みを上げる。{/n}「ああ、奴らには彼らには法律を破ろうと考える勇気すらないだろう」
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らを…」{n}彼は鉄の拳を握り締めた。オーグメティックが哀れな軋みを上げる。{/n}「ああ、奴らには彼らには法律を破ろうと考える勇気すらないだろう」

languages.text: "Ich würde sie ..." {n}Er ballt seine Eisenfaust, bis die Augmentierung jämmerlich quietscht.{/n} "Oh, sie würden es nicht wagen, an einen Gesetzesbruch auch nur zu denken."
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde sie ..." {n}Er ballt seine Eisenfaust, bis die Augmentierung jämmerlich quietscht.{/n} "Oh, sie würden es nicht wagen, an einen Gesetzesbruch auch nur zu denken."

languages.text: « Je les... {n}Solomorne s'interrompt en serrant le poing si fort que ses augmétiques laissent échapper un grincement pitoyable.{/n} Oh, je vous garantis qu'ils n'oseraient plus jamais enfreindre la loi. »
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: « Je les... {n}Solomorne s'interrompt en serrant le poing si fort que ses augmétiques laissent échapper un grincement pitoyable.{/n} Oh, je vous garantis qu'ils n'oseraient plus jamais enfreindre la loi. »

languages.text: «Los obligaría a...». {n}Cierra su puño de hierro con tal fuerza que el aumento emite un crujido lastimero.{/n} «Oh, ni se les pasaría por la cabeza volver a infringir la ley».
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: «Los obligaría a...». {n}Cierra su puño de hierro con tal fuerza que el aumento emite un crujido lastimero.{/n} «Oh, ni se les pasaría por la cabeza volver a infringir la ley».

languages.text: “我会让那些渣滓……”{n}他紧握铁拳，手上的植入物发出了凄惨的咯吱声。{/n}“噢，我会让他们连违法的念头都不敢有。”
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: “我会让那些渣滓……”{n}他紧握铁拳，手上的植入物发出了凄惨的咯吱声。{/n}“噢，我会让他们连违法的念头都不敢有。”

languages.text: "Onları..." {n}Demir yumruğunu sıkıyor, ogmetiği acıklı bir şekilde gıcırdıyor.{/n} "Yasaları çiğnemeyi akıllarından geçirmeye bile cesaret edemezlerdi."
languages.original_text: "I'd make them..." {n}He clenches his iron fist, the augmetic letting out a piteous creak.{/n} "Oh, they wouldn't dare to even think of breaking the law."

traits.locale_text: "Onları..." {n}Demir yumruğunu sıkar ve ogmetiği acıklı bir şekilde gıcırdar.{/n} "Ah... Kanunları çiğnemeyi akıllarından geçirmeye bile cesaret edemezlerdi."
